column5: Excellent Walleye, Pike, Muskie and Bass fishing at Byng Inlet Ontario right on Georgian Bay, only 45 minutes North of Parry Sound.The Sawmill-Lodge has American and Housekeeping plans, complete with 16Ft. Lund Boats at very affordable rates in CANADIAN FUNDS.Please see www.sawmill-lodge.com or call toll free 1-866-264-5464
